department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Supply and delivery of one Aluminum Solid Waste Transfer Trailer for the Jasper National Park Maintenance Facility
description: The Departments of Public Works and Government Services is seeking to acquire an Aluminum Solid Waste Transfer Trailer for delivery according to vendor specifications. The requirements for this acquisition are set by the Government of Canada procurement process and local regulations.
duration_in_months: These fields will be populated once the contract pertains to services or construction.
full_summary:
Tender Notice
================
### Contract Title
5P423-220167 Aluminum Solid Waste Transfer Trailer

### Reference
WS3712163842-Doc3742074050

### Status
> **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
> **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
> **Tender Status**: Cancelled

### Contract Information
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is canceling a requirement for the supply and delivery of one Aluminum Solid Waste Transfer Trailer.

### Background
Parks Canada requires one Aluminum Solid Waste Transfer Trailer for its Jasper National Park Maintenance Facility located at #1 Compound Road, Jasper, Alberta, T0E 1E0. The current contract deadline for bid submission is **December 19th, 2:00 PM EST (UTC-5)**.

### Scope of Work
The required Aluminum Solid Waste Transfer Trailer must be delivered by **March 31, 2023**.

### Key Requirements

* 1 x Aluminum Solid Waste Transfer Trailer
* Delivery to Jasper National Park Maintenance Facility, #1 Compound Road, Jasper, Alberta
* Delivery date: March 31, 2023

### Contract Cancellation
The tender process for this requirement is cancelled.

### Contact Information
Please contact [Ariane van Vien](mailto:ariane.vanvi@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) for further information.
